## What This Template Includes

- Custom logo and theming
- Code blocks with syntax highlighting
- Two-column layouts
- Diagrams with Mermaid
- Mathematical equations
- Tables and callouts
- Speaker notes

::: {.notes}
Press 'S' to open speaker view with notes and timer.
:::

## Code Examples

### Python

```{python}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("data.csv")
summary = df.groupby("category").agg({"value": ["mean", "std"]})
print(summary)
```

### R

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
library(tidyverse)

df <- read_csv("data.csv")
df |> group_by(category) |> summarise(mean = mean(value))
```

### Get Started

1. Click **"Use this template"** on GitHub
2. Clone your new repository
3. Edit this file: `content/index.qmd`
4. Run `make devel` to preview
5. Run `make deploy` to publish
